title: About
text:
My name is Nikos, and I am a computational scientist currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Bioinformatics at the Institute of Applied Biosciences, part of the Centre for Research & Technology, Hellas, under the guidance of Dr. Fotis Psomopoulos. I hold a Diploma in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki.
I am highly proficient in data analysis within the R project, utilizing its extensive libraries and tools for in-depth statistical modeling and data manipulation. My expertise also extends to data visualization, where I create compelling and informative visual representations that bring complex biological data to life. This combination allows me to effectively communicate research insights, making intricate scientific concepts accessible to both the scientific community and the public. You can explore my #TidyTuesday contributions on Twitter account for examples of my work.

title: Home page
text:
Nikos Pechlivanis
Bioinformatics @INAB/CERTH
Hi! Welcome to my GitHub page. My name is Nikos and I’m currently working my Ph.D. in Bioinformatics at the Institute of Applied Biosciences, part of the Centre for Research & Technology, Hellas. I hold a Diploma in Electrical and Computer Engineering from the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki.
My research focuses on exploring the intricate relationships between soil microbiomes and global geoclimatic patterns. Through this work, I aim to uncover the complex dynamics that shape Earth’s ecosystems.
